resources.string: Kuya kufuneka wamkele imvume yendawo ukuze iSecuritly isebenze
USecuritly kufuneka uyazi indawo yakho ngalo lonke ixesha

Ngaba uyafuna ukwenza indawo yakho isebenze?
Yiya kwiiSetingi -> Ii-Apps -> Securitly -> Hlala uvumela indawo.

Emva koko uqalise kwakhona iSecuritly
Thumela umyalezo kaxakeka xa ibhetri ikwinqanaba eliphezulu
Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukuseta kwakhona idata ehlala ikho?
Ngaba ufuna ukucima lomfowunelwa kuluhlu lwabafowunelwa bakho?

1. USecuritly ufuna ukwazi indawo okuyo ngalo lonke ixesha. Ukuze wenze oko, yiya kuseto lwesixhobo sakho -> ii -apps -> Securitly -> Iimvume kwaye utshintshe imvume yendawo ukuba "Vumela lonke ixesha".
2.Musa ukunyanzela ukuvala iSecuritly. Kungenjalo, umyalezo wakho kaxakeka awuzukuthunyelwa kubafowunelwa bakho.
3. Asikukhuthazi ukuba usete inqanaba lebhetri apho uza kuthumela umyalezo wakho kaxakeka kwi-1 okanye 2%, njengoko ifowuni yakho inokucima ngaphambi kokuthumela umyalezo.

Le app yenziwe ngabafundi aba-5 abavela kwiTekhnoloji Institute of Laguna, Mexico. Le projekthi yaqala njengengcinga esasizimisele ukuyenza, kwaye kunye nomcebisi wethu, injineli uGerardo, senze ukuba senzeka. Ngale app sinethemba lokufaka isandla kancinci ngemeko yangoku emhlabeni.

Indawo yokugqibela yesixhobo sam yaba:
isibanzi:
40.776570
ubude: -73.969979
I-Central Park yeSithili seMbali saseNtshona
ENew York, ngo-10024, EE. UU.
I-Securitly ayikwazi ukusebenza kuba imvume "Thumela iSMS" ayinikwanga

I-Securitly ayikwazi ukusebenza ngenxa yokuba imvume ye-"Soloko iNdawo" ayinikwanga. ISecuritly kufuneka iyazi indawo okuyo ukuze ikwazi ukuthumela indawo yakho yokugqibela eyaziwayo kubafowunelwa bakho obakhethileyo
Kubekho impazamo ekufumaneni indawo ecazululiweyo yesi sixhobo
